blogPost.excerpt: The fastest way to the smartest Google Search. 'Picked by LINER' is the most powerful assistant that will take your Google Search to the next level. Do not scan through all results. View only the pages selected by LINER. Available as browser extensions.
blogPost.body: The fastest way to the smartest Google Search. 'Picked by LINER' is the most powerful assistant that will take your Google Search to the next level. Do not scan through all results. View only the pages selected by LINER. Available as browser extensions.
blogPost.title: Improved Google Search by LINER - The smartest Google Search assistant powered by highlights
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 实现最智能谷歌搜索的最快方式。“由班轮挑选”是最强大的助手，它将把你的谷歌搜索提升到一个新的水平。不要浏览所有结果。仅查看由线框选择的页面。作为浏览器扩展提供。
localize.tagline: 最智能的谷歌搜索助手，由高亮显示提供支持

localize.description: 實現最智能谷歌搜索的最快方式。“由班輪挑選”是最強大的助手，它將把你的谷歌搜索提升到一個新的水平。不要瀏覽所有結果。僅查看由線框選擇的頁面。作爲瀏覽器擴展提供。
localize.tagline: 最智能的谷歌搜索助手，由高亮顯示提供支持

previous.title: Inflation Expectations in the US rise to their highest levels since 2013: 2.21% (5-year breakeven). https://t.co/WOI5meRF4R

localize.full_text: 美国的通胀预期升至2013年以来的最高水平：2.21%（5年盈亏平衡）。https://t.co/WOI5meRF4R。
美國的通脹預期升至2013年以來的最高水平：2.21%（5年盈虧平衡）。https://t.co/WOI5meRF4R。

next.excerpt: The Real-time WallStreetBets sentiment tracker measures the sentiment in the reddit forum. They also track WSB market sentiment relative to market (SPY) and have a WallStreetBets Index to monitor intraday price action of popular stocks that are discussed
next.title: r/WallStreetBets Sentiment Analysis -  Measure sentiment on the popular reddit forum

localize.description: 实时WallStreetBets情绪追踪器衡量了reddit论坛中的情绪。他们还跟踪WSB市场情绪相对于市场（SPY），并有一个WallStreetBets指数来监测讨论的热门股票的盘中价格走势。
localize.tagline: 在热门的reddit论坛上测量情绪。

localize.description: 實時WallStreetBets情緒追蹤器衡量了reddit論壇中的情緒。他們還跟蹤WSB市場情緒相對於市場（SPY），並有一個WallStreetBets指數來監測討論的熱門股票的盤中價格走勢。
localize.tagline: 在熱門的reddit論壇上測量情緒。
